channel.description:
Name-Blacksmith
The blacksmith lives in the castle forging his fine equipment, struggling to provide for his family. The blacksmith will provide weapons and armour to anybody. His loyalty lies only to his family and the gold that his humble trade brings in.
Alignment/type-Neutral support
Passive 1- Sharp steel- immune to wolves
Passive 2- Conversion immune
Day ability 1-
Day ability 2-
Night ability 1- Provide Sword- provide your finest steel to a target for the night. The targets attack tonight will bypass night immunity, and any defensive ability guarding the target's... target. [3 charges] [1 day cool down]
Night ability 2- Provide shield- provide your sturdiest shield to a target tonight. The target becomes immune to attacks (but not abilities) tonight.
Not sure if I should give provide shield charges or not.
Win requirements- Survive
